''Out on the Water'' is the nineteenth track of [[Blind Guardian]]'s Tolkien themed album, [[Nightfall in Middle-Earth]].

==Lyrics==
<poem style="font-style:italic; margin-left:20px;">Out on the water
The island of the dead that live
There they dwelt
Until they left the world and
Still their deeds live forth in songs
</poem>
[[Category:Songs by Blind Guardian]]
